@description.name: @description
@description.body: Utility for checking the type of a variable. It adds a type key static to q and offers the given method.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Get the internal class of the value. The following classes are possible: 
"String",
"Array",
"Object",
"RegExp",
"Number",
"Boolean",
"Date",
"Function",
"Error"

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {var} Value to get the class for.
@param.description: Value to get the class for.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} The internal class of the value.
@return.description: The internal class of the value.
